questions.question: I want to know what a pencil is
What is python programming language?
questions.answer: Python is a high-level, interpreted, and general-purpose dynamic programming language that focuses on code readability1. It was founded in 1991 by developer Guido Van Rossum2. Python’s design philosophy emphasizes code readability with the use of significant indentation1. It is dynamically typed and garbage-collected1.

questions.question: Who is gayatri?
questions.answer: She is an 8 year old girl.
